long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for in-situ learning of Artificial Intelligence online. Shows you where and why AI is being used online! As you are browsing the web, when you hover over elements that make use of AI, a popup will appear that gives you information on the type of AI being used and the reason it is being used.  Currently only works on Facebook, Amazon, and TripAdvisor.
